tap.title: belching beaver brewing branded & barreled mexican chocolate cake
Blue Owl Bobs Great Porter
tap.AdditionalNotes: Smooth with enjoyable flavors of chocolate

tap.title: St Arnold Tarnation
tap.AdditionalNotes: Four malts and four hops in the malty strong ale

tap.title: Blue Owl Spirit Animal
tap.AdditionalNotes: Spirit Animal offers a light and tart addition to a wonderful tasting ale

tap.title: Blue Owl Little Boss
tap.AdditionalNotes: Little Boss offers a light and tart addition to a wonderful tasting ale

tap.title: Meanwhile Pils
tap.AdditionalNotes: Meanwhile Pilsner offers a sharp and crisp quality with notes of apple.

tap.title: ABP Fire Eagle
tap.AdditionalNotes: The Fire Eagle is ABP's premiere IPA with bitter taste and an American body.

tap.title: ABP Peacemaker
tap.AdditionalNotes: ABP's easy going, very crisp and qualified pilsner.

tap.title: Vista Brewing Dark Skies
tap.AdditionalNotes: Don't let the dark color of this tap fool you. It's very smooth and ready for any hot day.

tap.title: Blue Owl Cherry Blossom
tap.AdditionalNotes: The Cherry Bomb is my favorite stout. It's packed with a sweet chocolatey and cherry flavor while it still holds a robustly bold body of a stout.

tap.title: Blue Owl Imperial Vanilla Stout
tap.AdditionalNotes: This is a full bodied stout with vanilla and chocolate flavors accompanied by a smooth finish.

tap.title: Wise Acre Tiny Bomb
tap.AdditionalNotes: This is a light and flavorful pilsner with a strong punch.

paragraph-1.text: Pair a Plain, Rosemary, or Cinnamon Raisin bagel with a cream cheese or chive schmear for a tasty breakfast on-the-go, or  grab our new White Cheddar and Prosciutto Grilled Cheese! We're slinging these bad boys all day from 8am until the hour before closing time.

paragraph-2.text: Happy Hour starts at 4 and last for the entire duration of the game. Look for the Longhorns logo on the draft board to take $3 off!

returning-tap-1.text: Saloon Door Kemah Suprema - American light lager, crisp and refreshing.

returning-tap-2.text: 4.7% Bear King Monkey Bridge Hefe - This style has a distinct banana character with hints of clove, a dry finish, full mouth feel, and high carbonation.

returning-tap-3.text: 5.8% Belching Beaver No Worries IPA - Strata, Galaxy, Mosiac, Citra, and Amarillo hops all lend their characteristics to this delightful West Coast IPA.

returning-tap-4.text: 6.2% BrewDog USA Hellcat IPA - BrewDog USA partners with Iron Maiden to create a fiesty India Pale Lager, citrus-forward with an especially complex balance of malts and hops.

returning-tap-5.text: 6% Pinthouse Island Kitty - A truly tropical IPA with a full body, some underlying hop character, and notes of juicy pineapple, tropical fruit, coconut, and nutmeg.

returning-tap-6.text: 6.5% Vista Hive Mind - This honey ale was brewed with wild yeast and 150 lbs of Central Texas Honey donated by 25 Central Texas beekeepers.

paragraph1.text: Chateau d'Oupia Les Heretiques Pays D'Herault - Andre Iche inherited an impressive 13th century castle and a large estate in the barren Minervois region. Iche, now in his sixties and never a member of his village coop, tended his very old vines and made his wines but sold everything in bulk to local negociants. Fifteen years ago, a Burgundian winemaker happened to be in Oupia, tasted Iches wines, and was so enthused that he convinced Iche to bottle and market his production. Since then, Iche has become an eternal twenty-year-old.

paragraph2.text: The Minervois Tradition is 60% Carignan (from Vineyards up to 100 years old), 30% Syrah, and 10% Grenache. It is aromatic, full and densely colored, with a long finish of dark fruits. The wine is elegant and balanced - it is both enjoyable to drink young and can age 5-7 years. Cuvee des Barons and Nobilis are 60% Syrah and 40% Carignan, from a selection of old vines in the best plots, and are aged in Bordeaux barriques for 20 months. They are slower to evolve than the Cuvee Tradition, and exhibit more elegance and restraint, but similar dark berries and spicy aromas.

paragraph1.text: Areni is Armenia's leading red grape variety, capable of making energetic wines full of bright fruity flavors. Zulal, meaning 'pure' in Armenian, was created to express the purest characteristics of Armenia's indigenous grape varieties grown in volcanic soils at high elevation. The 2018 Areni is a classic expression of the acient Areni variety.

paragraph2.text: The 2018 Areni is an aromatic wine with notes of red cherries, plums and notes pepper. On the palate it's medium-bodied, with refreshing acidity and concentrated flavors of berries and spices. 13% ABV

news-tap-1.text: Saloon Door Kemah Suprema - Walser Alpine Lager owes its inspiration to the crisp mountain lagers of the Swiss Appenzell. Rich golden in color with a delicately balanced profile of German Pilser malt, two varieties of Munich malt, and Spelt. Hopped with choice Hersbrucker, Tettnanger & Hallertau Tradition - meadow herbs and subtle spicy floral elements. 4.8% ABV

new-tap-2.text: Brewtorium Sidewalk Piper - Tradition meets legend in this malt-forward medium-bodied ale. Rich flavors of toffee and maple coalesce into a deep amber colored tap with a pleasant candied hazelnut finish. 5.1% ABV
